Header.title: Have you ever thought of that plastic bottles are no more waste?
Header.paragraph: Once you throw it anywhere a waste , Once you scan it in our box a Tiles
Header.Author: Tsion Bizuayehu

About.paragraph: Smart utilization of plastic bottles  in the production of paver blocks is  formed by  4th year AASTU students assigned by the University for IETP course. The team is organized to address the issue of plastic bottles taken as waste by recycling the bottles in smart way for the production of paver blocks

Services.name: A website
Services.text: A website for the Smart utilization of plastic bottles  in the production of paver blocks system

Services.name: A detection system
Services.text: A system that is assembled with Arduino, PIR sensors , with  it's setup for the presence of plastic bottles

Services.name: A Storage System
Services.text: A Storage  container for the plastics

Services.name: Melted plastics
Services.text: Melted plastics from the grinded plastic bottles
